text:
DATA PROTECTION STATEMENT

We appreciate how important it is to you that your personal information is treated with the utmost care. Please read on to find out what personal information and usage data we collect when you visit our donation platform, and how this information is used.

Responsible body

The responsible body as defined by the German Federal Data Protection Act is

{{organisation}}
{{address}}

Any questions you may have about data protection may also be sent by email to datenschutz@twingle.de. twingle GmbH (twingle GmbH, Prinzenalle 74, 13357 Berlin) is our technical service provider for anything related to the operation of this donation platform.

Collection, processing and use of your personal data

We have to collect and process certain personal data in order to allow you to support our work via the platform. We will only use your personal data for advertising and marketing purposes to the extent that you give us specific permission to do so. Under no circumstances will we transmit your personal data to third persons for other purposes without authorization.

We share data required to check on the status of payment and amount paid with the service providers involved in handling the payment. This is necessary in order to process your payment and ensure you are able to use the platform without problem. Service providers may not use these data for anything other than processing payments. They are also required to handle the information in accordance with this data protection statement and the German data protection legislation.

Following the payment process, you may leave us your personal data on a voluntary basis so that we can issue a donation receipt and/or for the purpose of contacting you. These data include, for example:

Your full name or company name
Your postal address
Your email address
Your home number or cell phone number

By transmitting your data you may consent to us contacting you, and to receiving further information about our work. You may retract your consent at any time by sending us an informal message with future effect.

Collection and processing of usage data

twingle uses Matomo, an open-source web analysis solution, for the purpose of analyzing usage data in relation to the donation platform. Matomo uses cookies (small text files), which are stored on your computer. All data are stored on a German server in anonymous form. IP addresses are also rendered anonymous prior to storage, and cannot be used to identify individual persons. No data is disclosed to third persons. If the "Do Not Track" function is activated in your browser cookies cannot be stored and usage data will not be analyzed. You may also manually prevent the installation of the Matomo cookie by clicking on the following button:

Recollida, processament i √∫s de les vostres dades personals

Hem de recollir i processar certes dades personals per permetre-vos donar suport al nostre treball a trav√©s de la plataforma. Nom√©s utilitzarem les vostres dades personals per a publicitat i m√†rqueting en la mesura que ens doneu perm√≠s espec√≠fic per fer-ho. En cap circumst√†ncia transmetrem les vostres dades personals a tercers per a altres prop√≤sits sense autoritzaci√≥.

Compartim les dades necess√†ries per verificar l'estat del pagament i l'import pagat amb els prove√Ødors de serveis involucrats en el processament del pagament. Aix√≤ √©s necessari per processar el vostre pagament i assegurar-vos que pugueu utilitzar la plataforma sense problemes. Els prove√Ødors de serveis no poden utilitzar aquestes dades per a res m√©s que processar pagaments. Tamb√© estan obligats a manejar la informaci√≥ d'acord amb aquesta declaraci√≥ de protecci√≥ de dades i la legislaci√≥ alemanya de protecci√≥ de dades.

Despr√©s del proc√©s de pagament, podeu deixar-nos les vostres dades personals de forma volunt√†ria perqu√® puguem emetre un rebut de donaci√≥ i/o per contactar-vos. Aquestes dades inclouen, per exemple:

En transmetre les vostres dades podeu consentir que us contactem i que rebeu m√©s informaci√≥ sobre el nostre treball. Podeu retirar el vostre consentiment en qualsevol moment enviant-nos un missatge informal amb efecte futur.

Recollida i processament de dades d'√∫s

twingle utilitza Matomo, una soluci√≥ d'an√†lisi web de codi obert, per analitzar les dades d'√∫s relacionades amb la plataforma de donacions. Matomo utilitza cookies (petits fitxers de text) que s'emmagatzemen al vostre ordinador. Totes les dades s'emmagatzemen en un servidor alemany de forma an√≤nima. Les adreces IP tamb√© es fan an√≤nimes abans d'emmagatzemar-se i no es poden utilitzar per identificar persones individuals. No es revelen dades a tercers. Si la funci√≥ "Do Not Track" est√† activada al vostre navegador, no es poden emmagatzemar cookies i no s'analitzaran les dades d'√∫s.
